snippet: Two powerful blasts near Makhachkala on Thursday killed as many as 20 people and wounded 30 others near a police post, news media reported.
abstract: Two powerful blasts in Dagestan, Russia, region where Islamist insurgents are seeking to create an Islamic state, kill as many as 20 people and wound 30 others near a police post.
lead_paragraph: Two powerful blasts near Makhachkala on Thursday killed as many as 20 people and wounded 30 others near a police post, news media reported.

headline.main: Russia: Dagestan Hit by Deadly Blasts
headline.print_headline: Russia: Dagestan Hit by Deadly Blasts
